document_data.caption: A map of Malatra not showing Beradandar.
document_data.name: Beradandar
document_data.mainbody: '''Beradandar''' was a city of the [[Kuong Kingdom]] in [[Malatra]] and once its temporary capital.
document_data.Geography: It lay between the cities of [[Parmahana]] and [[Ranguri]], far into the jungle.
document_data.History: After deserting their former capital at Parmahana some time in the early 8{{th}} century [[DR]],<ref group="note">This is "over 600 years" before a setting date of [[1357 DR]], so some time before [[757 DR]]. the [[Kuong]] people made an exodus through the jungle. They made a temporary capital at Beradandar, before moving on to the permanent capital at Ranguri.
document_data.Description: By the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], Beradandar was almost abandoned, yet its two temple schools and three [[monasteries]] remained in operation. They flourished as centers of learning and [[pilgrim]]age despite their isolation.
